title: ADum deivam
sahitya:
ADum deivam nI aruLvAi iDadu pAdam tUkki


anupallavi

  nADum aDiyar piravith-tuyaraRa vIDum tarum karuNai nidhiyE natam-


caraNam    shubam shEr kALiyudan Adip-paDu tOlviyanji tirucceviyil aNinda maNit-
tOdu vizhundadAga mAyam kAttiyum tozhum padam uyarattUkkiyum viri
prapancam muzhudhum ATTum nin tirup-padam tanjamena unai aDaindEn
parinden tiNDATTam kaNDu parishu tarum duraiyE sabhai naDuvil tad dhimi enru
